lead_paragraph: Philadelphia Eagles offensive tackle Lane Johnson is facing a 10-game suspension for violating the league's policy on performance-enhancing drugs, according to multiple media reports on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: NFL: Eagles Tackle Johnson Facing 10-Game Doping Ban, Says Report
headline.main: NFL: Eagles Tackle Johnson Facing 10-Game Doping Ban, Says Report

snippet: Philadelphia Eagles offensive tackle Lane Johnson is facing a 10-game suspension for violating the league's policy on performance-enhancing drugs, according to multiple media reports on Tuesday....
